mapper.select: SELECT s.code, s.user_code, s.subscribe_user_code, s.subscribed_date, u.nickname FROM subscribe s JOIN user u ON u.code = s.user_code WHERE subscribe_user_code = #{subscribeUserCode}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscribe (user_code, subscribe_user_code, subscribed_date) VALUES (#{userCode}, #{subscribeUserCode}, #{subscribedDate})
